title: Five Points Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. NY style pizzeria in the heart of East Nashville. Has a vegan pizza on the menu called the vegan pie consisting of Daiya cheese, spinach, artichokes, red onions, whole roasted garlic and fresh chopped basil. You can also substitute Daiya cheese on any whole vegetarian pie for an extra charge ($3 as of Oct 2014).
